channel.title: 🏢 University of Surrey, UK on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Surrey, UK on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: AV-GS: Learning Material and Geometry Aware Priors for Novel View Acoustic Synthesis
item.description: AV-GS: A novel Audio-Visual Gaussian Splatting model, uses geometry and material-aware priors to efficiently synthesize realistic binaural audio from a single audio source.
